dits.title: Missing semicolon after implicit thing declare
Missing semicolon after Str declare
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 9 (tests/fail.dit)
Str test
        ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after Str declare and assignment
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
Str test = 'cat'
                ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after list assignment
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 37 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Str test = ['Hello', 'world']
                                    ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after full import

                                 ^
